pdf.head:
<#if .locale == "zh_CN">
		
	<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
		
	<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
		
	<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
		
	<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
		
	</#if>
    
        
            


<@filecabinet nstype="image" style="width: 170px; height: 50px;" src="https://5455655.app.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=7154&c=5455655&h=c97eaadefe84e570be5c&fcts=20191127035759&whence=" />
 










 
Tax Invoice
 



 
 
 



Quantum Enterprise LLC
${companyinformation.mainaddress_text}
TRN No: ${companyinformation.employerid}
 
Invoice No: ${record.tranid}
Delivery No Ref: ${record.custbody_delivery_num}

Date: ${record.trandate}


<#assign customerName = record.entity> <#assign colonIndex = customerName?index_of(":")> <#if colonIndex != -1> <#assign lastPart = customerName?substring(colonIndex + 1)?trim> <#else> <#assign lastPart = customerName> </#if>
Customer: ${lastPart}
 
Customer PO Ref: ${record.otherrefnum}



Bill To: ${record.billaddress}
 
QE Estimate Ref: ${record.custbody_qe_ref_no}



 
PO Dated: ${record.custbody_customer_po_date}



 
Date of Supply: ${record.custbody_date_supply}



TRN No.: ${record.entity.vatregnumber}
 
Place of Supply: ${record.custbody_place_supply}



 
 
Currency: ${record.currency}


        
        
            


 



P.O. Box: 114346, Dubai, U.A.E. : Tel.: +971.4.2953354 ; Fax: +971.4.2953356; E-mail: qe@qe.ae




 of
pdf.body:
<#if record.item?has_content>
<#assign tax1subtotal = 0 > <#assign tax2subtotal = 0 > <#assign tax3subtotal = 0 > <#assign tax1subtotal1 = 0 > <#assign tax2subtotal2 = 0 > <#assign tax3subtotal3 = 0 > <#list record.item as item><#if item_index==0>



Sr. No
        Items
No.  
		Part No
		Brand
		Description
		Qty
		Unit
Price tax1amt
        Taxable
Amount
		Vat%
		Vat Amt
		Amount


</#if><#function toNumber val><#if val?has_content && val?length gt 0 ><#return val?html?replace('[^0-9.]','','r')?number ><#else><#return 0 ></#if></#function><#if item.item.internalid != "125"><#if item.item.internalid != "126"><#if item.item.internalid != "127">


<#assign tax3subtotal = (item.rate?html?replace('${record.currency}', '')?replace(",", "")?trim?number)*item.quantity >
${toNumber(item_index)+1}
${item.custcol_item_model}
${item.item}
${item.custcol_item_brand}
${item.description}
${item.quantity}
${item.rate?html?replace('${record.currency}', ' ')}
${tax3subtotal?string.currency?replace("Â¤", "")}
${item.taxrate1}
${item.tax1amt?html?replace('${record.currency}', ' ')}
${item.grossamt?html?replace('${record.currency}', ' ')}

<#assign tax1subtotal1 = (item.rate?html?replace('${record.currency}', '')?replace(",", "")?trim?number)*item.quantity > <#assign tax2subtotal2 = item.quantity > <#assign tax3subtotal3 = item.amount?html?replace('${record.currency}', '')?replace(",", "")?trim?number > <#assign tax1subtotal = tax1subtotal + tax1subtotal1 > <#assign tax2subtotal =  item.taxrate1> <#assign tax3subtotal = tax3subtotal + tax3subtotal3 > </#if></#if></#if></#list>
<#if record.discounttotal?has_content> <#assign discountTotalStr = record.discounttotal?replace(record.currency, '')?replace(',', '')?trim /> <#if discountTotalStr?has_content && discountTotalStr?matches("^-?\\d+(\\.\\d+)?$")>


 
 
 
 
Discount
 
 
${record.discounttotal?replace(record.currency, '')}
${tax2subtotal}
${record.custbody_tax_per_amt?replace(record.currency, '')}
${record.custbody_final_tax_amot?replace(record.currency, '')}

</#if> </#if>


 
 
 
 
Total - ${record.currency}
 
 
${record.custbody_subtotal_dis?html?replace(record.currency, ' ')}
 
${record.taxtotal?html?replace(record.currency, ' ')}
${record.total?html?replace(record.currency, ' ')}

</#if>
<#assign amountInWords = record.custbody_total_price_aed?lower_case> <#assign formattedAmount = amountInWords?replace("-", " ")?capitalize >

Amount in Words: ${formattedAmount}

<#if record.currency == "AED"> 




Tax Invoice Summary
 
 
Taxable Amount
Tax Amount



Total in Local Currency
 
${record.currency}
${record.custbody_subtotal_dis?html?replace(record.currency, ' ')}
${record.taxtotal?html?replace(record.currency, ' ')}

<#else> 




Tax Invoice Summary
 
 
Taxable Amount
Tax Amount



Total in Local Currency
Rate AED / ${record.currency} ~ ${record.exchangerate?html?replace(record.currency, ' ')}
AED
${record.custbody_subtotal_aed?html?replace(record.currency, ' ')}
${record.custbody_tax_aed?html?replace(record.currency, ' ')}




Total in Foreign Currency
 
${record.currency}
${record.custbody_subtotal_dis?string.currency?replace("Â¤", "")}
${record.taxtotal?html?replace(record.currency, ' ')}

</#if> <#if record.custbody15?has_content><#assign customrecord = record.custbody15?eval>




 
 
Tax Code
Tax Rate
Tax Amount


<#list customrecord as customrecord_line><#assign printField = customrecord_line.amt>

 
 
${customrecord_line.name}
${customrecord_line.rate}
${printField?number?string.number}



 
${record.custbody_tax_amt_in_words}

</#list>
</#if>


Bank Details:
 ${record.custbody_bank_details.custrecord_ibd_bank_details}



TERMS & CONDITIONS :



GOODS ONCE DELIVERED AND ACCEPTED CANNOT BE TAKEN BACK / EXCHANGED.



Note:



All bank fees for wire transfers shall be the responsibility of the sender.



This is a system generated document and is valid as original.



VAT Invoice is as per ARTICLE 59.1 OF EXECUTIVE REGULATIONS and Article 65 to 69 of VAT Decree Law 2017.



 
 
 



Acknowledged by: Client/Authorized Representative:
 



 
Quantum Enterprise L.L.C.
 





 
 



<@filecabinet nstype="image" style="width: 80px; height: 50px;" src="${record.custbody_signature_url1}" />
<@filecabinet nstype="image" style="width: 125px; height: 65px;" src="https://5455655.app.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=49139&c=5455655&h=rqwE6RgaLPqW3WLOzm6Lht1xwCOGrAAR_cyiNLATGocyrKbV" />





_____________________________________________
 
_____________________________________________



Name & Signature
 
Signature & Stamp
